--- named_schema_create_table_backquoted.sql
CREATE TABLE `ORDER`.`ORDER`(PK INT64) PRIMARY KEY(PK)
--- AST

  Rparen: 53,
  Name: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 20,
        Name: "ORDER",

      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 21,
        NameEnd: 28,
        Name: "ORDER",
      },
    },
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 29,
        NameEnd: 31,
        Name: "PK",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 32,
        Name: "INT64",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
  },
  PrimaryKeys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 51,
        NameEnd: 53,
        Name: "PK",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE `ORDER`.`ORDER` (PK INT64) PRIMARY KEY (PK)
